title: Lab wins Best Paper Award at CVPR 2024
content: Our team received the Best Paper Award for our work on federated learning in medical imaging at CVPR 2024.

title: New grant for AI in Surgery
content: We have been awarded a major grant to develop AI-powered surgical navigation systems.

title: Lab hosts annual AI in Healthcare Symposium
content: Researchers and clinicians from around the world joined us for a day of talks and demos.
